nodes.bodyText:
If set up the runner will push metrics to a configured sink at a configured period.

Could you elaborate or rephrase this sentence? I think it misses "then" somewhere since it starts from "if".
I asked a native, it is correct but lacks the , after set up. But I'll elaborate a bit to clarify.

As for now only REST http sink and graphite sinks are supported

I's suggest to drop the first "sink", and leave it like:
"As for now, the only REST HTTP and Graphite sinks are supported"
Do you have any code examples of metrics export? It will worth to add if any.
there is no more code than what is present in the examples in previous sections. The user only needs to configure the export to export the metrics he defined in his pipeline, what do you mean ?
I was thinking about any useful examples that will help users to use it.
